relation: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower Defense.
The foe is attacked with sharp claws. It may also lower the foe’s Defense.
Slices target with sharp claws. May lower Defense.
The user slashes the foe with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target’s Defense.
The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Defense.
The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense.
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Crush Claw (move)" - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Description Crush Claw inflicts damage and has a 50% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat by one stage. Prior to Generation IV, it was the signature move of Zangoose.
